Accessed on 2008-07-02. | population_total = 694750 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | iso_code = DZ-10 | area_code_type = Area Code | area_code = +213 (0) 26 | blank_name_sec1 = Districts | blank_info_sec1 = 12 | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank1_info_sec1 = 45 | website = | footnotes = }} Bouïra is a province in Algeria. The capital is also named Bouïra. ==Districts== The province has 12 districts. There are also 45 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # Aïn Bessem # Bechloul # Bir Ghbalou # Bordj Okhriss # Bouïra # El Hachimia # Haïzer # Kadiria # Lakhdaria # M'Chedellah # Souk El Khemis # Sour El Ghozlane ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
